description:
A select assortment of some of the Great White North’s favourite bits, designed to fit in tools with the large and small bit driver.

  • Kit includes: Flat screwdrivers 1/4in. and 3/16in. Phillips and flat tip eyeglass screwdriver, flat screwdriver 1/8in. and Torx #15, Robertson 1 and 2, Phillips #1-2 and Screwdriver 3/16in
name: Leatherman Canadian Bit Kit
